sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "./tour-card.css" import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import { Link} from 'react-router-dom' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, city, title, photo, price, featured, reviews} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return
{featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not rated':(({reviews.length}))}
{title}
${price} /per person
} export default TourCard
